97a1(mdo sde): som nyi las brgal te/ the tsom dang bral zhing zug rngu phyung nas/ yongasu yi chad pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ bdag gis bdag gang lags snyam du bdag gi yid la phyir skye bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /
97a2(mdo sde): btsun pa zhu ba lung bstan pa khyad par rtogs pa gang dag bdag gis ma thob pa las/ da ni bdag gis yun ring po zhig lags na/ bcom ldan 'das la brten te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
97a3(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal nas/ som nyid dang yid gnyis kyi zug rngu rtsa ba nas bton lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka sngon cad dge slong dang /
97a4(mdo sde): bram ze gzhan dag la yang dri ba 'di lta bu dris pa dran nam/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ btsun pa glo ba la dran pa lags te/ dus gcig na sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i 'dun sa/ chos bzang du
97a5(mdo sde): lha rnams 'dus shing 'khod par gyur to/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshol zhing mchis pa las/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
97a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma rnyed nas/ stan las langs te/ so sor bgyis pa de dag gi nang nas/ lha che bar grags so 'tshal gnas nas shi 'phos zhing mi snang bar gyur nas/ btsun pa lha che bar
97a7(mdo sde): grags so 'tshal/ gnas nas shi 'phos pas/ bdag kyang skrag cing bag tsha bar gyur te/ bdag kyang gnas 'di nas shi 'phos par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas/ bdag dge sbyong dang / bram ze gcig pu
97a8(mdo sde): dben par gnas pas gnas shing mchis pa/ gang dang gang mthong ba de dag de bzhin gshigs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags snyam nas/ de dag gi thad du mchis na/ de dag
97b1(mdo sde): gis bdag la khyod su yin zhes 'dri bar bgyid de/ bdag gis de dag la bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhes bgyis nas/ de dag dga' zhing mgu ste/ kye ma bdag gis/ brgya byin mthong ngo zhes ched du
97b2(mdo sde): brjod pa/ ched du brjod par bgyid de/ de dag bdag la dri ba bgyid kyis/ de dag la bdag 'dri bar mi bgyid lags so/ /de dag bdag la skyabs su mchis bar bgyid kyis/ bdag de dag la skyabs su
97b3(mdo sde): mchis par mi bgyid lags so/ /de slan cad bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lags te/ bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchis lags so/ /rtogs pa la ni mtha' ma mchis/ /bdag la the
97b4(mdo sde): tsom dang nem nur ma mchis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa tshol ba'i phyir ring po zhig tu 'khyam 'khyam ste/ /long ba bdag ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /bsnyen bkur bgyid du mchis mchi na/ /bdag gis ji ltar mnyes
97b5(mdo sde): pa'i thabs/ /de dag la ni dris pa las/ /lam dang de bzhin bsgrub pa yang / /de dag yong gi gtam ma 'tshal/ /bdag ni cung zad ci 'dod pa/ /rtogs par gyur dang dpyad pa dang / /yid kyi 'gro dang 'ong ba yis/ /
97b6(mdo sde): sems ni thugs kyis thugs su chud/ /yid kyang yid kyis rig gyur nas/ /de dag thams cad de ring du/ /bcom ldan 'das ni dgra bcom gyis/ /bsgrags shing lung yang bstan par gyur/ /khyod ni sangs
97b7(mdo sde): rgyas ston pa khyod/ /rgyal ba khyod kyis bdud kyang btul/ /khyod kyis bag nyal bcad nas kyang / /rgal nas skye dgu sgrol bar mdzad/ /'jig rten du ni khyod sangs rgyas/ /khyod las lhag pa yong ma mchis/ /
97b8(mdo sde): lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/ /gang zag khyod kyi zla ma mchis/ /dpa' bo chen po khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /srid pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa ste/ /nyi ma'i rigs skyes khyod la 'dud/ /
98a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis sngon chad bden pa thob pa dang / yid bde ba thob pa 'di lta bu nyams su myong bar dran nam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ yid bde ba thob pa
98a2(mdo sde): ni bdag gis myong bar dran lags so/ /bden pa thob pa ni nyams su myong ba dran lags so/ /btsun pa lan cig cig na/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na/ lha rnams ni rgyal/ lha ma yin rnams ni pham nas/
98a3(mdo sde): bdag gis 'di snyam du sems te/ da ni gdag lha'i grong khyer du mchis la/ lha'i longs spyod gang lags pa dang / lha ma yin gyi longs spyod gang lags pa de dag lhan cig tu tshogs pa dga' bzhin du/ longs spyod par bgyi'o/ /
98a4(mdo sde): snyam pa de ni yid bde ba thob pa lags te/ /de ni yun ring por 'thab mo'i mtha' can lags/ mtshang 'dru ba'i mtha' can lags/ 'gyed pa'i mtha' can lags/ rtsod pa'i mtha' can lags so/ /btsun pa
98a5(mdo sde): bdag gis yid bde ba thob pa dang / bden pa mthong ba 'di ni yun ring por 'thab mo ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags/ 'tshang 'dru ba ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags 'gyed pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags/
98a6(mdo sde): rtsod pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' can lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i bka' drin stsal ba gang lags pa de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ bdag gnas 'di nas shi 'phos
98a7(mdo sde): nas mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par phyug cing longs spyod che ba dang / rdzas dang yo byad mang ba dang / bdog pa mang ba dang / nor dang / 'bru dang gser dang dngul dang / mdzod dang / bang ba'i tshogs mang ba'i
98a8(mdo sde): rigs gang lags pa dang / mdza' bo dang / grogs po dang / phu nu dang / nye du mang ba dang / bran pho dang / bran mo dang / las byed pa dang / zho shas 'tsho ba de lta bu'i khyim du skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig /
98b1(mdo sde): de nas bdag mthar gyis skyes te/ dbang po rnams smin nas/ sbyin bdag byin zhing bsod nams dag bgyid nas/ skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos tshon can bgos nas yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab
98b2(mdo sde): tu byung te/ btsun pa bdag 'os par gnas shing / gal te bka' lung thob na bka' lung bzhin bgyid par gyur cig /de ltar bdag 'os par gnas na/ sdug bsngal gyi mthar thug pa ni de lags so/ /snyam
98b3(mdo sde): bgyid do/ /gal te bka' lung ma thob na ni de ltar na bdag gzugs mchis pa'i lha'i yid las skyes pa/ dbang po ma nyams shing dbang po tshang ba yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang ldan pa mdog bzang
98b4(mdo sde): ba/ rang la 'od mchis pa/ namakha' la 'gro ba/ dga' ba'i zas za ba/ dga' ba'i zas dang ldan pa/ tshe ring ba yun ring du gnas pa der/ bdag 'gran zla ma mchis par skye bar shog shig snyam bgyid do/ /
98b5(mdo sde): lha'i lus 'di las shi 'phos shing / /mi ma yin pa'i tshe spangs nas/ /rmongs pa med par mngal du 'jug /gdag gi yid ni sdom la dga'/ /man ngag gis ni 'phongs mi 'gyur/ /bstan pa'i lam la rten bcas
98b6(mdo sde): shing / /tshangs par spyod la gzhol bgyis nas/ /bsod nams rgyu ba spyad par bgyi/ /bdag ni 'os par gnas gyur kyang / /gal te bka' lung thob gyur na/ /bka' lung stsal ba bzhin du bgyi/ /de nyid bdag
98b7(mdo sde): gi sdug bsngal mtha'/ /gal te de ltar ma gyur nas/ /tshe'i mtha' ni zad pa'i tshe/ /'og min lha ni gang yin pa/ /de dag du ni skye bar shog /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa lags so/ /bde bar
98b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa bdag ni rgyun tu zhugs pa lags so/ /lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i re ba yang bdag la mchis lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka legs so legs so/ /
99a1(mdo sde): de'i skal ba khyod la yod de/ de yang bag yod pas 'thob bo/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ gang gis bdag ni zhi 'gyur la/ /rgyun tu zhugs par nges 'byung ba/ /bcom ldan 'das khyod
99a2(mdo sde): las gzhan la med/ /khyod kyi bstan las gzhan la med/ /khyad par rgya chen dang po'i gzhi/ /gzhan dag lta la ga la mchis/ /khyad par thob pa ci 'dra ba/ /sngon can gzhan las yong ma thob/
99a3(mdo sde): btsun pa bdag ni 'di nyid na/ /mchis shing lha lus bgyid bzhin du/ /bdag gis tshe ring thob lags kyis/ /blo ldan de ltar gzung du gsol/ /chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i dbang
99a4(mdo sde): po brgya byin dang / lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes te/ des bden pa mthong nas/ stan de kho na las shi 'phos nas/ stan de kho na nyid la phyir skyes so/ /de ltar de shi
99a5(mdo sde): 'phos pa dang / skyes pa ni mig mi 'dzum pa dang / mi snang bar gyur pa dang / lus kyi reg pa'i sgo nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen to/ /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs kyis kyang
99a6(mdo sde): rtogs so/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo bde sogs kyis/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la smras pa/ ko'u shi ka khyod shi 'phos nas/ skyes lags sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ bde sogs nga shi 'phos nas phyir
99a7(mdo sde): skyes so/ 'di na 'dug bzhin du phyir bdag gi tshe lo thob par gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bden pa mthong nas dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' zhing yi rangs te/ dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas stan
99a8(mdo sde): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni 'phags so/ /'phags pa
99b1(mdo sde): lags so/ /deng slan can ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dge bsnyen lags pa dang / khong nas dga' ste skyabs su mchis lags par gzung du gsol/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dri za'i bu gtsug phud lnga pa la smras pa/
99b2(mdo sde): bu khyod ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du 'gro bar thog ma khyod kyis bskul to/ /bu zur phud lnga pa bdag cag 'di nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i yul du dong nas/ khyod sngon yun ring po nas
99b3(mdo sde): 'dod cing smon pa gang yin pa'i dri za'i rgyal po dum bu'i bu mo bzang mo zhes bya ba bzang de/ khyod kyi chung mar sbyin no/ /dri za rnams kyi dbang po khyod kyi pha'i rgyal sar yang gzhug go/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
99b4(mdo sde): sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smras pa/ grogs po dag bdag gis sngon cad mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la/ dus sum du tshangs pa la 'os pa'i 'dud pa byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ bdag gis da phyin cad bcom ldan
99b5(mdo sde): 'das 'di nyid la tshangs pa la 'os pa'i 'dud par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid tshangs pa yin tshangs par gyur pa yin/ zhi ba yin zhi bar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
99b6(mdo sde): lha gzhan rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mdun gyis phyogs shing phyir nur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dud bzhin du/
99b7(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis mig lam du mi snang bar gyur pa'i sa nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ phus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
99b8(mdo sde): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ lha'i dbang po de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas dge
100a1(mdo sde): slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar gyur la/ 'dis
100a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das lha brgyad khri bo 'di rnams kyis kyang las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas brgya byin 'di kho na la brten nas/
100a3(mdo sde): 'di rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes par ma bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang las gyur to/ /gsol pa/ 'di rnams kyis smon lam gang tu btab
100a4(mdo sde): lags/ bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo bzhi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
100a5(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung te/ des gang gi tshe bla na med pa'i
100a6(mdo sde): ye shes brnyes nas/ /rgyal po'i pho brang mdzes ldan du gshegs pa de'i tshe/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi phyir rgyal po mdzes pas/ gtsug lag khang lnga brgya pa brtsigs te/ gnas
100a7(mdo sde): khang drug stong byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul te/ gtsug lag khang de dag tu yo byad thams cad sbyar nas/ 'khor brgyad khri dang bcas pa/
100a8(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la/ mchod pa la brtson par gyur to/ /de nas gang gi tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig /sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las
100b1(mdo sde): thams cad mdzad nas/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/ rgyal po mdzes pas de'i sku gdung la mchod pa byas nas/ sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/ rnam pa
100b2(mdo sde): thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byas nas/ mchod rten de la mchod pa byas te/ smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ bdag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der gal te/ lhar skye bar gyur na ni/ lha che bar
100b3(mdo sde): grags pa/ lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur cig /gal te mir skye bar gyur na ni mi che bar grags pa'i mi rnams kyi nang nas rgyal srid kyi mnga' bdag tu gyur cig ces byas so/ /de nas rgyal pos smon lam 'debs pa zhabs ring
100b4(mdo sde): ba rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/ lhas smon lam ci zhig btab lags/ de nas de dag la rgyas par bsnyad nas/ de thos ma thag tu de dag gis kyang mchod rten de la bkur sti byas nas/ smon lam btab pa/ kye ma
100b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na/ bdag cag gang dang gang du skye bar 'gyur ba de dang der phyug cing / nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skye bar shog shig /rgyal po 'di kho na la brten nas/ bdag cag gis ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes
100b6(mdo sde): par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe rgyal po mdzes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di kho na yin te/ des der
100b7(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas nas/ smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ ched 'ga' lhar skyes pa'i tshe ni lha che bar grags par
100b8(mdo sde): gyur te/ lha rnams kyi mnga' bdag byas so/ /ched 'ga' mir skyes pa'i tshe ni/ mi che bar grags par gyur nas/ mi rnams kyi rgyal srid kyi mnga' bdag byas te/ dge slong dag nga yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
101a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig dang shin tu mnyam pa dang / shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang thabs mnyam pa brnyes par gyur nas/ 'dis nga mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyes par ma byas so/ /de'i
101a2(mdo sde): tshe zham ring ba brgyad khrir gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ lha brgyad khri bo 'di dag kho na yin te/ de dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bsnyen bkur byas nas/
101a3(mdo sde): smon lam btab pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der/ phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/ brgya byin 'di kho na la brten nas 'di rnams kyis nga mnyes par byas te/
101a4(mdo sde): mi mnyes par ma byas so// //rgyal po zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na/ bram ze zhig gnas pa des/ thabs zlar bab pa las/ chung ma blangs nas de de
101a5(mdo sde): dang lhan cig rtse dga' zhing dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa na bu btsas nas de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ yi ge dang bram ze'i spyod lam dang / spyod pa dang /
101a6(mdo sde): oM zhes bya ba dang / b+ho zhes bya ba dang / gtsang sbra dang / cho ga dang thal ba blang ba dang / ril ba thogs pa dang / nged brjod kyis rig byed dang / mchod sbyin gyi rig byed dang / snyan tshig gi rig byed dang / srid
101a7(mdo sde): srung gi rig byed dang / mchod sbyin bya ba dang / mchod sbyin byed du gzhug pa dang / sbyin pa dang blang ba dang / kha don byed pa dang / kha ton slob du gzhug pa'i thabs bslab nas/ las rnam pa drug la mkhas pa'i bram
101a8(mdo sde): zer gyur te/ de mthar gyis rig pa'i gnas bcwo brgyad la byang bar gyur te/ /de nas phyi zhig na pha ma gnyis shi'o/ /de gnyis shi nas khye'u des bsam pa/ bram ze rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi
101b1(mdo sde): bar du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas/ de'i 'og tu chung ma len par byed kyis/ bdag gis kyang lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam nas/ des lo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du tshangs par spyod pa
101b2(mdo sde): spyad nas chung ma blangs te/ de'i chung ma gzugs bzang zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa dang / g.yem zhing skyes pa 'dod pa zhig te/ de khyim thabs rgan po dang lhan cig 'dug pas snying mi tshim nas/ des skyes pa gzhan btsal
101b3(mdo sde): to/ /de nas phyi zhig na/ de'i blo skyes pa/ bdag gis khyim thab 'di ji srid 'di na 'dug pa'i bar du ni/ bdag skyes pa gzhan dang lhan cig nyal ba'i skabs med kyis/ bdag gis 'di yul gzhan du btang bar bya'o snyam nas/
101b4(mdo sde): bram ze de la smras pa/ ji ltar jo bo'i khyim na ji yang mi bdog na/ khyod kyis bdag blangs te ci bgyi/ bdag pha ma'i khyim du slar mchi'o/ /'on kyang bdag gis 'tshal ma bde blag tu 'tshal tu mchis so/ /bram zes smras
101b5(mdo sde): pa/ bzang mo mi dga' bar ma byed cig /bdag cag bram ze rnams la slong mos 'tsho ba yang yod kyis/ bdag yul gzhan du song la nor btsal te/ phyir 'ong ngo zhes byas nas/ chung ma la rgyags 'phogs te song ngo /
101b6(mdo sde): de song nas kar sha pa ni mang po zhig rnyed nas de dag khyer te/ mnyan du yod par chas pa las/ de lam du mi rgod kyis bcom nas de shin tu sug bsngal bar gyur te/ gal te bdag khyim du song na ni bram ze mo dang 'thab
101b7(mdo sde): mo chen po 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/ bdag gis 'tsho ba 'di lta bu btang la/ nags khung thibs por song te/ bdag 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nags khung thibs por songs te/ shing ka nas thag pas btags nas/
101b8(mdo sde): 'gag par byas pa las/ de'i skabasu bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ bram ze 'di nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon gsum du byed par 'gyur ba zhig na/
102a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i gzu lums byed cing 'dug go snyam du dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ nags khung thibs po der gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la bka' stsal pa/
102a2(mdo sde): bram ze gzu lum ma byed cig /ngas khyod la nor sbyin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la gter bstan te/ bram ze khyod kyi nor 'di yin gyi srog 'phangs pa ma dor cig ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
102a3(mdo sde): slar gtsug lag khang du gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze des nor de dag khyer te rang gi khyim du song nas/ de khyim gyi 'byor pa rgyas par byas te bzhag nas sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed pa la zhugaso/ /de nas phyi zhig na de'i
102a4(mdo sde): blo skyes pa/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni bdag la phan pa dang ldan pa yin gyis/ khyim na gnas pa btang la/ de'i thad du rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam ste/ khyim gyi 'khor btang nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom
102a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / shes pa dang / rang bzhin thugasu chud nas de dang mthun
102a6(mdo sde): pa'i chos bstan te/ des na bram ze des stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas stan
102a7(mdo sde): las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
102a8(mdo sde): to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob du rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /
102b1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung te/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas/ de la lung yang 'phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
102b2(mdo sde): spangs te/ dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa bram ze 'di dbul bas 'jigs nas/ bdag nyid 'gum par bgyid pa las/ bcom ldan 'das
102b3(mdo sde): kyis nor gyi phung po chen po dang sprad te/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus la
102b4(mdo sde): yang bram ze 'di dbul bas 'jigs nas/ bdag nyid 'chi bar byas pa las/ ngas nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la ci ltar gnas par byas pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus
102b5(mdo sde): na/ grong khyer bA ra na se na rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba rgyal po byed de de'i ring la 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa zhi ba dang / 'khrug pa dang /
102b6(mdo sde): nang 'khrug dang / chom rkun dang / nad dang / mu ge med pa dang / 'bras sA lu dang / bu ram shing dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang ldan par 'dug ste/ gnod pa med cing 'tsher ma dkrugs la/ bu cig pa sdug pa la bya ba bzhin du chos bzhin
102b7(mdo sde): du rgyal srid byed do/ /rgyal po yang byams pa'i bdag nyid can snying rje dang ldan pa/ sems can la byams pa/ sbyin pa la dga' ba zhig ste/ de sbyin pa dag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byed de/ dge slong dang / bram ze dang / sdug cing 'phongs pa
102b8(mdo sde): dang bkren pa rnams la ci dang ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed do/ /bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po sta 'on byas te/ srog chags nam mkha' la gnas pa dang / chu na gnas pa dang / thang la gnas pa rnams la sbyin par byed do/ /'jig rten dag kyang dge ba bcu'i
103a1(mdo sde): las kyi lam la bkod par byed do/ /de nas phyin can bdag gis sems can rnams la thams cad sbyin no zhes dam bcas so/ /de nas chos bzhin du rgyal po byed pas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis kyang de la bsrung ba
103a2(mdo sde): dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir brtson par byed de/ de dag gis dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs shing 'bru rnams rgyas par byed do/ /rgyal po de'i 'bangs kyi nyi 'og gi rgyal po ni/ chos ma yin pas rgyal po byed de/ shing sgrog dang /
103a3(mdo sde): rkang sgril dang / lag sgril dang / an pan gdags pa rnams kyis/ yul na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la gnod par byed de de'i mi rnams nan gyis dpya blo skyes rgyud mas 'jigs te/ rgyal po dbang chen sde'i yul du dong ste 'khod do/ /de nas
103a4(mdo sde): phyi zhig na nyi 'og gi rgyal po de blon po mang pos zhabs 'bring byas nas/ yul bltar song song ba las/ des bltas na grong dang grong rdal dang / grong khyer dang / nags khrod kyi grong dang / tshong dus rnams stongs par mthong nas/ blon po
103a5(mdo sde): rnams la kwa'i ci'i phyir yul stongs pa la thug par gyur ces dris na blon po rnams na re/ lha rgyal po dbang chen sde'i yul 'byor pa dang / rgyas pa dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang ldan la/ skye bo mang po de dag kyang dpya khral ma
103a6(mdo sde): mchis pa dang / 'gro bas 'khod pa na/ skye bo phal po rnams der dong te 'khod do zhes zer ro/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu nyi 'og gi rgyal po khros nas/ dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te/ rgyal po dbang chen sde dang yul 'gyed
103a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir drangs so/ /de nas rgyal po dbang chen sde nyi 'og gi rgyal po de khros nas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi go bskon te/ bdag dang g.yul 'gyed pa'i phyir drangaso zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang blon po rnams bsogs te
103a8(mdo sde): bsgo ba/ kye ngas ni tshe gcig gi 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir sdig pa byed mi phod gyis/ gal te khyod yul phung bar 'gyur mi 'dod na ni/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po de la phyag 'tshol cig /nga ni de la gnod pa byed mi phod do zhes byas nas/ tshigasu bcad de
103b1(mdo sde): smras pa/ nags kyi nang na shing shun shar ba'i gos gyon cing / /'bras bu za la gcan zan dag dang 'grogs kyang bla'i/ /'jig rten pha rol dag gis 'dzem pa'i mi rnams kyis/ /rgyal srid dag gi phyir ni gsod dang bcing mi bya/ /de nas
103b2(mdo sde): blon po rnams kyis bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di ni su la yang gsod mi phod de/ bdag cag kun med par gyur na mi rung gis/ bdag cag thams cad gyi na la sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bas ni/ bdag cag 'di gcig pu bor yang bla'o snyam nas de
103b3(mdo sde): dag gis rgyal po bor te/ nyi 'og gi rgyal po de la babaso/ /de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes kyang tshor te/ blon po 'di rnams kyis bdag bor ro snyam nas/ nags kyis nang du gnas bcas te/ de der song nas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za zhing 'dug go/ /
103b4(mdo sde): de song ba'i 'og tu nyi 'og gi rgyal po de 'ongs nas yul mi rnams phab te/ rgyal po de gar song zhes dris na/ blon po rnams na re/ lha bros nas 'gro'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas nyi 'og gi rgyal pos yul de cham du phab ste/ dpa' bo thams cad kyi
103b5(mdo sde): bya dgar bgo bshar byas nas/ yul de nyid du btab te 'dug go/ /de nas de'i tshe ri khrod kyi grong zhig na/ bram ze dbul po 'tsho bas 'phongs pa zhig gnas te/ mthar gyis de'i bu dang bu mo mang po dang bcas nas/ de gso ba mang la yul der
103b6(mdo sde): mu ge yang byung nas/ de khyim gyi bza' mi rnams bskyed ma nus so/ /de nas bram ze des bA ra na ser rgyal po dbang chen sde zhes bya ba bzhugs te/ rgyal po de yang byams pa'i bdag nyid can/ snying rje dang ldan pa sems can la byams pa/ sbyin
103b7(mdo sde): pa la dga' ba/ thams cad sbyin par byed pa zhig go zhes thos nas/ bdag de'i thad du 'gro bar bya'o/ /de'i thad du song ba dang bdag ni nor de las 'ong snyam nas/ bA ra na ser song ngo de der song nas rgyal po dbang chen nagasu gnas bcas so
103b8(mdo sde): zhes thos so/ /de thos ma thag tu bram ze de/ shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas bsam pa/ bdag de'i thad du dka' thub kyi nags tshal du song ba dang / de der 'dug kyang bdag la nor sbyin par gyur yang srid do snyam nas/ sa phyogs gang na
104a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gnas pa der song ste/ de'i thad du song nas byang chub sems dpas de la tshig 'jam pos mgu bar byas te/ rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dag byin nas dris pa/ khyod 'dir ci la 'ong / bram zes smras
104a2(mdo sde): pa/ da ltar mu ge byung ste/ 'phongs shing gnod par gyur la/ bdag la gso ba yang mang na/ bdag gis de dag gso yang ma nus nas/ bdag gis thos na rgyal po dbang chen sde ni thams cad sbyin par byed do zhes de
104a3(mdo sde): thos nas/ de bdag gi nor gyi 'byung khung du 'gyur ro/ /snyam ste/ khyim gyi thad du mchis so/ /byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ des nags kyi nang du gnas bcas so zhes khyod kyis ma thos sam/ da de la
104a4(mdo sde): nor ga la yod/ de nas de thos ma thag tu bram ze de re thag chad nas sa la 'gyel to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa'as de'i gdong du chu gtor te de bslang ngo / /de nas des bsam pa bdag la 'tsho ba 'di lta bu ci dgos kyis
104a5(mdo sde): bdag song la nags stug po'i nang du zhugs te/ 'chi bar bya'o snyam nas thag pa khyer te nags stug po'i nang du zhugs nas shing ka nas thag pas btags te 'gag par byas pa las/ byang chub sems dpa'as thong nas/
104a6(mdo sde): mthong ma thag tu snying rje skyes nas/ des bsam pa gal te bram ze 'dis bdag khrid de dgra'i thad du song na ni des 'di la nor gyi phung po sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ bram ze de la smras pa/ bram ze gzu lum ma byed cig
104a7(mdo sde): dang / ngas khyod kyi dbul ba bcad par bya'o/ /bram ze khyod tshur shog /nga phyin ka log tu dam por bcings la/ rgyal po che ge mo zhig gi thad du khrid de/ song shig dang / des khyod la nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin par
104a8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro/ /bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni khyod lta bu 'chings mi phod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'as smras pa/ the tsom med par gyis la nga chings te khrid de song shig /de las thabs gud na ma mthong ngo / /de nas bram
104b1(mdo sde): ze na re khyod ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes bgyis nas/ bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' phying ka log du bcings nas khrid de bA ra na ser chas so/ /de nas de skye bo mang po de dag gis mthong nas ngo shes te/ de dag
104b2(mdo sde): rgyal po'i thad du song ste gsol na/ de dag la rgyal po yid ches nas/ de brten bzhin du rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyung te/ byang chub sems dpa'i thad du song nas/ bram ze des/ byang chub sems dpa' dam du bcings
104b3(mdo sde): te khrid de 'ongs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang dris pa/ 'di khyod kyi ga las khrid de 'ongs/ des smras pa/ 'di ni lha'i dgra lags te/ 'di ni bdag gis dka' thub kyi nags tshal na gnas pa las mthus bzung nas
104b4(mdo sde): khrid de mchis so/ /de nas rgyal pos bsam pa/ rgyal po 'di ni lus che zhing stobs che la/ bram ze 'di ni lus nyams chung bas na/ 'di ni gzung bar ga la nus te/ 'di ni snying rje che la sems can la byams pas na/
104b5(mdo sde): 'dis bdag gis bdag bcings nas/ 'di la byin gor ma chags snyam ste/ bram ze/ 'di khyod kyis ji ltar gzung ba drang por smros shig /de nas bram ze des rgyal po de la ji ltar gyur pa bzhin du bsnyad do/ /de nas de thos
104b6(mdo sde): ma thag tu rgyal po de dad par gyur nas sems can dag pa 'di lta bu la bdag gis/ gnod pa byas so snyam nas bdag nyid kyis bkrol te/ rgyal po'i pho brang du spyan drangs nas yan lag thams cad kyis mkhyud de/
104b7(mdo sde): seng ge'i khri'i steng du gzhag nas/ cod pan gyi thabs phud de/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la btags nas smras pa/ khyod ni rgyal po'i 'os lags kyi/ bdag ni 'os ma lags so zhes byas nas/ des de
104b8(mdo sde): la dpung gi tshogs dang / dkor mdzod rnams phul nas bzod pa gsol te rang gi yul du song ngo / /de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes/ bram ze de la nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
105a1(mdo sde): gnas par byas so/ /dge slong dag de'i tshe rgyal po dbang chen sder gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ bram ze 'di kho na yin
105a2(mdo sde): te/ de'i tshe yang 'di dbul bas 'jigs pas/ bdag nyid 'chi bar byas pa las/ ngas nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gnas par byas so/ /da ltar yang 'di dbul bas 'jigs pas/ bdag nyid
105a3(mdo sde): 'chi bar byas pa las/ ngas nor gyi phung po chen po byin nas/ g.yung drung gi mthar thug pa grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do// //rngon pa zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga tar ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
105a4(mdo sde): pa las/ rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas/ rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe lha byin ni rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo mang po la rtag tu nyes pa byed de/ gang dang gang la
105a5(mdo sde): nyes pa byed pa de dang / bcom ldan 'das la nyes pas sting bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la chos gos bsnam sbyar gyon te/ dge
105a6(mdo sde): slong su yang rung ba zhig grogs su khrid la/ rgyal po'i khab tu lam po che dang srang dang / bzhi mdo' dang sum mdo' dag tu bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la lhas sbyin nam/ lhas sbyin gyi phyogs su nyes pa nyes
105a7(mdo sde): pa byas pa des sangs rgyas sam chos sam dge 'dun la bdog par ma byed cig ces sgos shig / gal te lhas sbyin ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no zhes zer na/ sngon ni rdzu 'phrul che na da ni de'i rdzu 'phrul nyams so/ /
105a8(mdo sde): shes gyis shig ces bka' stsal te/ /de nas kun dga' bo song ste/ rgyal po'i khab tu lam po che dang / srang dang / bzhi mdo' dang / sum mdo' dag tu bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams la bsgo nas/
105b1(mdo sde): phyin cad bcom ldan 'das la nyes par sting bar mi byed do/ /de nas phyi zhig na bcom ldan 'das bsnyung bar gyur to/ sman pa 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la sman mar lcags mda' zhes bya ba phul lo/ /
105b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i rgyal po/ 'tsho byed la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed ngo mtshar che 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed rmad du byung ngam/ gsol
105b3(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das rmad du byung lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod shes sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal lags so/ bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod mi shes sam/
105b4(mdo sde): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag ma 'tshal lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed ci zhig ngo mtshar che/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das pa rnams rtswa za zhing chu 'thung la/ de dag las bdud rtsi 'di grub cing /
105b5(mdo sde): des sman mar lcags mda' zhes bgyi ba bsgral lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed ci zhig rmad du byung / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba las/ dam pa'i chos
105b6(mdo sde): bstan pa dang / dge 'dun gyi bsgrubs pa/ bzang po 'byung ba lags so/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod ci zhig shes/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes slan cad gdon mi 'tshal
105b7(mdo sde): bar 'gum par 'tshal lo/ /bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod ci zhig mi shes/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang du mchi ba de ma 'tshal lo/ /de nas dge slong rnams the tsom skyes nas/ the tsom
105b8(mdo sde): thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ la gsol pa/ btsun pa 'tsho byed kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te/ gsungs pa rtogs pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das
106a1(mdo sde): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar 'ba' shig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa/ ci ltar rtogs pa de nyon cig /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das
106a2(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/ ri khrod kyi grong shig na khyim bdag phyug cing / nor mang la longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des/ thabs zlar bab pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' la dga'
106a3(mdo sde): dgur spyod do/ /de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las/ phyis zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ de zla ba dgu 'am/ bcu lon pa dang / khye'u zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston zhag
106a4(mdo sde): bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar rgyas par sbyar nas/ rigs dang mthun par ming btags so/ /de'i 'og tu yang de rtse zhing dga' la dga' dgur spyod pa las bu zhig btsas te/ de'i
106a5(mdo sde): yang btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ rigs dang mthun pa'i ming btags so/ /de nas bsam pa/ bdag gi bu lon 'tshob pa la/ nor spyod pa skyes zin gyi/ zong khyer la bdag
106a6(mdo sde): yul gzhan du 'gro bar bya snyam mo/ /de nas yang bsam pa/ bdag gis chung ma 'di byad gzugs bzang bas/ bdag gis 'di la kar sha pa ni mang po byin te song na ni/ skyes
106a7(mdo sde): pa gzhan dang / lhan cig tu dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur yang srid kyis/ ma la bdag gis 'di la kar sha pa ni nyung zhig byin te 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ des de la kar sha pa ni nyung ngu zhig byin
106a8(mdo sde): nas/ de ma yin pa gser rnams ni bum pa'i nang du bcug te/ bum pa'i mgrin pa mu tig gi 'phreng bas bcings nas/ dur khrod du shing rta rna zhes bya ba'i drung du sbas te bzhag
106b1(mdo sde): nas/ zong khyer te yul gzhan du song nas/ des der rnyed pa mang po grub nas des der yang chung ma blangs te 'dug na de'i bu mang po btsas so/ /de nas chung ma snga ma
106b2(mdo sde): gdu gu zhes bya bas lag pa 'ongs nas/ des nye dus bshug pa tsam gyis bu gnyis gsos ma thag nas/ bu gnyis kyis smras pa/ bdag
106b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyi pha gar song / mas smras pa/ bu yul ga ge mo zhig na gnas che ge mo zhig na 'dug ste/ de nor phun sum tshogs pa chen po
106b4(mdo sde): dang ldan zhes grag gis/ der song shig dang gal te na khyed kyi 'tsho ba'i thabs cung zad sbyin yang srid do zhes byas so/ /
106b5(mdo sde): de nas phu bo shos pha tshol du song ba las de lam nas lam du 'khor 'khor te/ mthar gyi pha'i drung du phyin nas/ phas bzhin gyi
106b6(mdo sde): gzugs las ngo shes nas skad phyung te smras pa/ khyod ga las 'ong / da gar 'gro zhes byas nas des rgyas par bsnyad do/ /
106b7(mdo sde): de nas phas
107a1(mdo sde): bsam pa/ 'di ni bdag gi bu de kho na yin no snyam nas/ des de bdag gi thad du bzhag nas bsko ba/ bu khyod kyis su la yang bdag gi pha yin zhes ma zer cig ces byas nas/ des de la byams par gyur to/ /
107a2(mdo sde): de nas bu gzhan rnams kyis yab khye'u 'di su'i lags/ phas smras pa/ nga'i mdza' bo'i bu yin no/ /de nas de dag gis bsam pa/ 'di ltar 'di las shin tu byams pa las/ 'di nyid kyi bu yin gor ma chag snyam
107a3(mdo sde): mo/ /de nas de dag gcig la gcig smras te/ 'di ni bdag gi phu bo yin no zhes zer ro/ /de nas phas bsam pa/ dgra'i nang na ni 'di lta ste/ mas dbyen 'di ma rung ba yin te/ 'di bsad du 'ong gis phyir btang ngo / /
107a4(mdo sde): de lta mod kyis gal te bdag gis cung zad cig 'di la byin na yang ldong pa can yin pa'i phyir lam du bsad du 'ong na/ ma la bdag gis 'di phyir btang ngo snyam nas/ yi ge zhig bris te byin pa/ gnas nas shar phyogs logs su
107a5(mdo sde): dpag tshad gcig tsam na/ /grong nas grong du mgyogs kyi rna ba'i shing drung na/ /thabs la mkhas pa bag dang ldan pas brkos nas kyang / /bdag dang nor skal gcig pa khyod kyis gsol bar gyis/ /mgul na 'dug pa gang
107a6(mdo sde): yin de ni gdu gu ma la byin zhes zer ba zhig yi ger bris nas byin te/ des yi ge khyer nas chas te song ba las/ nu bo rnams kyis lam du bzung ste/ pha las khyod kyis ci thob ces smras so/ /des smras pa/ ci yang ma thob ste/
107a7(mdo sde): yi ge 'di byin par zad do zhes byas so/ /de nas de dag na re 'di ni phas brid pa ste song shig ces byas nas de btang ste/ mthar gyi rang gi khyim du phyin nas/ re shig ngal sos shing / 'dug 'dug na mas smras pa/ khyod kyis pha
107a8(mdo sde): las ci thob/ bus smras pa/ ci yang ma thob mod kyi/ yi ge 'di lta bu zhig thob bo/ /mas smras pa/ bu khyod phas brid de/ lam gyi tshegs byung ba kho nar zad de ci yang ma grub bo/ /bus smras pa/ yul 'di ni che ba yin te/
107b1(mdo sde): bdag 'drid par mi byed do zhes byas nas/ de yi ge de dpyod pa la zhugs te/ grong nas zhes bya ba ni gang du skyes pa yin te/ de ni 'dir grong zhes bstan to/ /grong du zhes bya ba ni gang du phyung te/ bsreg pa'i sa yin no/ /mgyogs kyi
107b2(mdo sde): rna ba'i shing gi drung zhes bya ba la mgyogs shes bya ba ni rta yin te/ de ni rna ba'i shing zhes bya ba ni rta rna zhes bya te/ shing rta rna'i drung la bya'o/ /gnas nas shar phyogs logs su zhes bya ba ni shar phyogs yin no/ /dpag tshad
107b3(mdo sde): gcig tsam na zhes bya ba de ni dpag tshad gcig kho na la bya'o/ /des tshigs su bcad pa de lta bur dpyad nas/ mtshan mo mi rgyu ba'i tshe dur khrod du song nas/ de'i 'dab na rta rna zhes bya ba'i shing zhig 'dug te/ des de'i shar phyogs su
107b4(mdo sde): bcal te gnya' shing tsam tshun cad brkos pa dang / re shig na gser gyi bum pa mgrin pa mu tig gi phreng bas bcings pa zhig mthong nas/ de dga' ches te blangs nas khyim du song te/ mu tig gi phreng ba bkrol nas
107b5(mdo sde): gdu gu ma la byin no/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe khyim bdag du gyur pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe de'i bur gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'tsho byed 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs
107b6(mdo sde): so/ /da ltar yang 'dis nga'i dgongs te gsungs pa rtogs so/ /de nas 'tsho byed kyis bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' la sku che bas na/ sman mar nyung ngu 'dis gso bar mi nus so snyam ste/ des brtags
107b7(mdo sde): nas sman mar sum bcu rtsa gnyis srang la bcal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi skur gsol te/ lhung bzed kyi lhag ma ni dge slong rnams la bstabs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed kyi lhag ma'o snyam nas/
107b8(mdo sde): dge slong rnams kyis btud cing btung ngo / /de nas lha byin gyis bsam pa/ bdag gis kyang sman mar btung ngo snyam nas/ des 'tsho byed la dris pa/ 'tsho byed dge slong go'u ta mas sman mar ci zhig thung / 'tsho byed
108a1(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/ srang sum cu rtsa gnyis gsol to/ /lhas sbyin gyis smras pa/ ngas kyang srang sum bcu rtsa gnyis gtong ngo / /'tsho byed kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni rdo rje lta bu'i sku mnga' la sku che bas na/ /
108a2(mdo sde): sman mar de snyed gsol ba dang / 'ju bar spyod kyis khyod kyis ni 'ju mi nus so/ /lha sbyin gyis smras pa/ nga yang rdo rje lta bu'i lus can yin na/ ci'i phyir 'ju bar mi nus shes byas nas/ des kyang srang sum cu rtsa gnyis
108a3(mdo sde): mthungaso/ /nga rgyal gyi dbang gis ma zhu ba na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ni zhu bar gyur/ lhas sbyin gyis zhu bar ma gyur to/ /de nas phyi nyin yang 'tsho byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la sman mar 'bras chen gyi khu ba dang bcas
108a4(mdo sde): te sbyar ba gsol to/ /lhas sbyin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol bas/ nga rgyal gyi dbang gis ma zhu bzhin du sman mar 'bras chen gyi khu bar sbyar te 'thungs pas/ zug gzer gyis btab ste/ gnad la bab pa'i
108a5(mdo sde): na tshas theb nas/ gzhi des sdug bsngal drag pa dang mi bzad pa dang / tsha ba dang / yid du mi 'ongs ba'i tshor ba myong nas/ nyin mtshan du gnyid kyang mi ldog par gyur to/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni/ phu bo la byams te
108a6(mdo sde): des gtam de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag glang po che'i sna lta bu 'khor lo dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung ris dang ldan pa/ bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las byung ba 'jigs
108a7(mdo sde): pa thams cad dbugs 'byin par byed pa'i phyag brkyang ste/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las thal nas lha sbyin gyi mgo la bzhag ste/ bden pa mdzad pa/ bden pa gang gis nga'i bu gcig pa sgra gcan zin bzang po sdug
108a8(mdo sde): gu la ci lta ba bzhin du sems lhag chad med par lhas sbyin la yang de kho na bzhin du sems na/ bden pa 'dis ni nad zhi bar gyur cig ces gsungs nas/ bden pa bskul ba de kho na'i mod la lha sbyin gyi nad zhi bar gyur
108b1(mdo sde): te/ srog yal ba las phyir thob par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag mthong nas ngo shes te/ des bsam pa 'di ni dge slong go'u ta ma'i lag pa yin no snyam nas/ de yun ring po nas sems kyi rgyud g.yo
108b2(mdo sde): sgyus/ /bsgrub pa'i rgyags pas gos shing dbang du byas pas na/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyis nad zhi bar byas kyang / 'di skad du don grub khyod kyis dpyad legs par lobs te/ 'dis khyod 'tsho ba rnyed par
108b3(mdo sde): nus so zhes zer ro/ /de nas 'khor na 'khod pa rnams kyis sgra bsgrags pa/ lhas sbyin nad tshabs chen pos gzir te srog yal ba la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bden pa bskul bas sos par mdzad do zhes
108b4(mdo sde): 'dzer to/ /lha sbyin gyi phyogs su shin tu zhen zhen pa rnams kyis kyang de thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ngo mtshar che bar brjod do/ /kye ma 'di'i byams pa ni yang dag par phun sum tshogs par gyur to/ /kye ma
108b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams la snying rje bsgomaso zhes/ 'dzer to/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis lha sbyin la smras pa/ lha sbyin khyod ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sos par mdzad do/ /gyin da srog dang bral zin to/ /lha sbyin gyis
108b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'di ni yid bsgyur bar byed pa'i sgyu shes te/ des na 'jig rten thams cad zhi bar byed do/ /de nas de dag 'di ni drin du mi gzo ba dang / byas pa mi tshor ba zhig go snyam ste/ dong nas bcom ldan 'das ga
108b7(mdo sde): la ba der dong te lhags nas/ the tsom skyes te/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ btsun pa lhas sbyin drin du mi gzo ba dang / byas pa mi tshor ba dang / byas pa chud gsan
108b8(mdo sde): pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di ji ltar drin du mi gzo ba dang / byas pa mi tshor ba dang / byas pa chud gson par byed pa de
109a1(mdo sde): nyon cig dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ yul be de ha zhes bya ba na/ rgyal po dbang chen sde rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe nags khung dgon pa zhig na khron pa zhig yod de/ khron pa de'i nang du
109a2(mdo sde): srog chags lnga lhung te/ mi dang / seng ge dang / sbrul dang byi ba dang bya khra rnams so/ /rngon pa zhig kyang nags khung dgon pa de na ri dgas bshor zhing 'dug pa las/ skom zhing gdungs nas khron pa de'i drung du song ste/ des khron pa
109a3(mdo sde): de'i nang du bltas na mi des mthong ma thag tu kus btab ste/ kye grogs po bdag cag gi skyabs gyis shig ces byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu rngon pa de yang de dag la snying rje skyes nas/ gal te bdag gis 'di
109a4(mdo sde): rnams ma phyung na ni/ 'di dag thams cad gyin da la 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des thag pa khyer te 'ongs nas de dag thams cad khron pa de'i nang nas bton to/ /de nas phyi zhig na rngon pa de ri dgas shor zhing nags khung
109a5(mdo sde): du song ba las/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge des mthong nas/ seng ges rngon pa la smras pa/ grogs po khyod ci'i phyir nags khung 'di na rgyu zhing 'dug /rngon pas smras pa/ ri dgas bshor ba'i phyir bdag 'di na rgyu
109a6(mdo sde): zhing 'dug ste/ bdag gi 'tsho ba 'di yin no/ /seng ges smras pa/ grogs po khyod nyon mongs par ma byed cig /ngas khyod la drin lan glan par bya ste/ khyod 'di na 'dug na ngas nyin gcig bzhin du ri dgas bzang ngo
109a7(mdo sde): cog bsad de/ sha ji snyed dgos pa de snyed sbyin no zhes smras nas/ ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge song ste/ des nyin gcig bzhin du ri dgas bzang ngo cog bsad nas/ mi de la sha mang po sbyin no/ /de nas phyi zhig na
109a8(mdo sde): rngon pa des sha khur gyis bskyal te/ rang gi khyim du 'gro ba na/ de bya khra des mthong nas ngo shes te/ khra des rngon pa de la smras pa/ grogs po khyod dka' bas 'tsho ba 'di lta bu zhig gis 'tsho zhing 'dug gam/
109b1(mdo sde): rngon pas smras pa/ bdag cag gi 'tsho ba ni 'di yin te/ thabs 'dis bdag 'tsho ba 'tshal lo/ /de nas khra des bsam pa/ mi 'dis sngon bdag gi srog phyung bas na/ 'di la bdag gis drin lan bsab dgos so snyam
109b2(mdo sde): nas/ des smras pa/ grogs po khyod 'dir 'dug shig dang bdag gi khyod kyis dbul bcad par bya'o zhes byas nas song ngo / /de nas khra des rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du song nas/ bdag gi 'dir ci zhig rnyed par gyur cig gu
109b3(mdo sde): bdag gis de khyer nas mi de la sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/ steng gi nam mkha' la lding bzhin du bltas na/ de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang de na rgyal po dbang chen sde'i btsun mo dam pas rgyan thams cad bkrol nas gab rtse'i
109b4(mdo sde): nang du bzhag ste/ skra bkrus pa las khras rgyan rnams khyer nas mi de la byin te/ des khyer te rang gi khyim du chas pa las/ mi des mthong nas ngo shes te dris pa grogs po khyod kyis 'di ga las rnyed/ rngon pas
109b5(mdo sde): de la smras pa/ khras bdag la byin no zhes smras nas/ rngon pa de bdag gi khyim du song ngo / /de nas rgyal po dbang chen sdes/ bya ba thams cad la bsgo ba/ khyod deng la bya tshang thams cad du song ste/ rgyan de dag khyer te
109b6(mdo sde): shog shig ces byas so/ /mi snga ma des kyang tshor nas bsam pa/ 'dis bdag la lan gnyis khron par lhung ba las phyung na mi rung gis/ bdag rgyal po'i thad du song la gsol bar bya'o/ /'on tang bdag
109b7(mdo sde): la bya dga' sbyin par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ mi de song te rgyal po la gsol pa/ rngon pa che ge mo zhig gis/ lha'i rgyan rnams khyer ro zhes byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu de la bya dga' chen po byin no/ /
109b8(mdo sde): de nas rngon pa de bkug ste/ rgyan rnams kyang phrog nas khri mon du bcug go khri mon na 'dug pa na/ byi ba des mthong nas ngo shes te des bsam pa/ mi gang gi srog phyung ba de ni 'di yin gyis/
110a1(mdo sde): 'di la bdag gis drin lan bsab par bya'o snyam nas/ des smras pa/ grogs po khyod ci nyes te khri mon 'dir bcug /de nas des de la rgyas par thams cad bsnyad do/ /de nas byi ba des smras pa/ grogs
110a2(mdo sde): po khyod brtan par mdzod la/ spro ba chen po bskyed cig dang / ngas khyod 'di na 'dug pa'i tshe/ zas dang skom gyis mod mi gzung bar bya'o zhes byas nas/ byi ba des mi de khri mon na 'dug pa de la zas dang / skom gyis mod
110a3(mdo sde): mi gzung bar byas so/ /de nas phyi zhig na mi de khri mon na 'dug bzhin du/ sbrul gdug pa des srog cig tu byas te/ 'di la drin lan glan par bya'o snyam du bsam nas/ mi de la smras pa/ kye mi khyod ngas khyod khri
110a4(mdo sde): mon/ 'di nas thar bar byas te/ dbang phyug gi bdag po chen po la gzhag par bya'o zhes byas nas/ ngas rgyal po 'di dug gis zin par byas la/ de bdag gi dug gis ci bya gtol med par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe
110a5(mdo sde): khyod khri mon na 'dug pas/ rgyal po 'di gzhan sus kyang sos par byed mi nus te/ nga 'ba' zhig gis gso nus so zhes bgyis shig /de nas rgyal po des khyod dgug pa dang / khyod der song la ba lang gi lci bas
110a6(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gyis la/ me sbar te sngags bzlas brjod gyis shig dang / khyod kyi sgra thos pas nga 'ong gis khyod kyis nga 'ongs pa dang / 'di skad du/ yang na mer mchongs shig /yang na rgyal po'i dug med par gyis shig
110a7(mdo sde): ces byos shig dang / ngas khyod la 'di skad du bdag ni me'i nang du mchongs par bya'i/ rgyal po'i dug ni med par mi bya'o zhes bya'o/ /de nas khyod kyis nga la 'di skad du khyod kyis srog bor du rin kyang / ngas kyang rgyal
110a8(mdo sde): po'i srog mi gtong gi/ khyod kyi rgyal po 'di'i dug med par mi byar mi rung ngo gyis shig dang / ngas khyod kyi tshig gis rgyal po'i dug med par bya'o/ /'on tang de'i tshe rgyal po khyod la mnyes par gyur nas/
110b1(mdo sde): khri mon nas btang ste/ nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ sbrul gdug pa de song ste rgyal po de dug gis zin nas/ rgyal po de ci bya gtol med par gyur nas/ rngon pa des btson srung rnams la smras
110b2(mdo sde): pa/ rgyal po 'di sus kyang dug med par mi nus te/ ngas 'di'i dug med par bya'o zhes byas so/ /de nas btson srungs rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to/ /de nas rgyal pos mi de bkug ste smras pa/ kye gal te mi
110b3(mdo sde): khyod kyis nga'i srog gi skyabs byed nus par gyur na/ ngas khyod la nor gyi phung po chen po sbyin no zhes byas so/ /de nas mi des smras pa/ lha brtan por mdzod la spro ba chen po bskyed cig dang / bdag mchis bzhin du khyod grong
110b4(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ro zhes byas nas/ mi des ba lang gi lci ba'i dkyil 'khor byas nas/ me sbar te sngags brjod do/ /de nas de thos nas sbrul gdug pa de dkyil 'khor gyi drung du 'ong ste 'dug go/ /de nas mi des smras pa/
110b5(mdo sde): khyod ni 'di na 'dug pa don gnyis shig bya dgos te/ yang na ni rgyal po'i dug med par gyis shig /yang na ni me'i nang du mchongs shig ces byas so/ /de nas sbrul gdug pas smras pa/ bdag ni 'di na 'dug pa
110b6(mdo sde): don gnyis bya dgos pa las/ yang na bdag nyid btang bar bya dgos so/ /yang na rgyal po bsad dgos so zhes byas nas/ sbrul gdug pa de mngon du phyogs shing 'dug pa las/ mi des bzlog ste smras
110b7(mdo sde): pa/ khyod kyis srog bor du zin kyang ngas rgyal po'i srog mi btang gis/ khyod kyis rgyal po 'di'i dug med par mi byar mi rung ngo zhes byas so/ /de nas de thos ma thag tu sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i dug med
110b8(mdo sde): par byas so/ /de nas rgyal po mnyes par/ gyur nas/ rngon pa de nor gyi phung po byin te btang ngo / /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe mngon par gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa
111a1(mdo sde): gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no/ /de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po la gsol ba gang yin pa de ni/ lhas sbyin 'di kho na yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'di drin du mi gzo ba dang / byas pa mi tshor ba dang / byas pa chud gson par gyur to// //
111a2(mdo sde): las brgya tham pa/ bam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa/ rmongs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe yul shug par ka na khyim bdag gcig gnas pa
111a3(mdo sde): des/ thabs zlar bab pa las ma chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan gcig rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas/ zla ba dgu 'am bcu lon pa dang / khye'u gzugs bzang
111a4(mdo sde): zhing blta na sdug la mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgyas par byas nas/ ming rmongs pa zhes btags so/ /de nas khye'u rmongs pa 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying kus bskyed
111a5(mdo sde): bsrings te/ de gang gi tshe cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ yi ge dang / khong rtsis dang / shod dgod pa dang / lag rtsis dang / dbyung ba dang / dgram pa dang / gos brtags pa dang / nor bu brtags pa dang / rin po che brtags pa dang /
111a6(mdo sde): spos brtags pa dang / sman brtags pa dang / glang po che brtags pa dang / rta brtags pa dang / go mtshon brtags pa bslabs te/ yi ge mkhas pa dang / klog mkhas pa dang / 'dzangs pa dang / bya ba la gsal
111a7(mdo sde): ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang / brtags pa rnam pa brgyad la byang bar gyur to/ /de nas phyi zhig na de'i lus shur bur yungs 'bru tsam sha stag gis khyab par gyur te/ shur bu de dag kyang smin te rdol nas/ de'i lus
111a8(mdo sde): rmas zhu lub tu g.yogs par gyur to/ /de nas de'i phas sman pa thams cad las yo byad sbyar te gsos kyas/ des sos par byed ma nus nas/ de ci tsam du tshab che bar gyur pa de tsam du/ lus las rnag khrag 'dzags
111b1(mdo sde): te dri nga ba byung ngo / /de nas de'i lus thams cad spos chu sna tshogs kyis byugs te gos gyis g.yogs nas gso bar byed do/ /de nas de'i phu nu rnams kyis mthong nas ming spos te/ khye'u 'di'i lus gos dang / rgyan rnams
111b2(mdo sde): kyis g.yogs pas na/ 'di'i ming sbas pa zhes bya'o zhes zer ro/ /de nas de la la las ni rmongs pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /la las ni sbas pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /de nas phyi zhig na de'i pha ma gnyis shi'o/ /
111b3(mdo sde): pha ma gnyis shi nas las su bya ba thams cad khye'u des tshis byed de/ de las gang byed kyang rung zhing blas byed kyang rung / tshong byed kyang rung gru'i las byed kyang rung / de las byas so chog 'jig cing 'grub par mi 'gyur
111b4(mdo sde): ro de nas khyim bdag rmongs pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis 'dir las gang byed kyang rung ste/ zhing blas byed kyang rung / tshong byed kyang rung / gru'i las byed kyang rung / bdag gi las byas so chog 'jig
111b5(mdo sde): cing grub par mi 'gyur na/ 'jig rten na mi 'jig pa'i chos gang 'jig par mi 'gyur ba 'ga' lta yod dam zhig gu snyam mo/ /de nas khyim bdag rmongs pa de'i mdza' bo dang / grogs po dang phu nu dang /
111b6(mdo sde): rgan rabs rnying gi sngon gyi lha zhig khyim bdag rmongs pa'i khyim gyi sgo ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ khyim bdag rmongs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
111b7(mdo sde): khyim bdag khyod kyis 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mi shes sam/ khyim bdag gis smras pa/ lha bdag gis ni 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos
111b8(mdo sde): can gang yin pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mi shes na/ lha khyod kyis 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos gang yin pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa shes sam/ lhas smras pa/
112a1(mdo sde): khyim bdag ngas kyang 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mi shes so/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ lha 'o na 'jig rten na 'jig pa'i chos
112a2(mdo sde): can gang yin pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos/ ma yin pa sus shes/ lhas smras pa/ khyim bdag shes pa yod de/ dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i bu/ shAkya'i rigs las skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos tshon
112a3(mdo sde): can rnams bgos nas/ yang dag pa'i dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ bcom ldan 'das des ni 'jig
112a4(mdo sde): rten na 'jig pa'i chos can gang yin pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin pa gang yin pa mkhyen to/ /khyim bdag gis smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das de da ltar ga la bzhugs/ lhas smras pa/ khyim bdag shar phyogs
112a5(mdo sde): kyi ljongs na/ yul mnyan du yod pa zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de'i nang na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/ da ltar bcom ldan 'das de zhugs kyi/ khyim bdag khyod 'dod na/ bcom ldan
112a6(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der song la der phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la don 'di dris la/ bcom ldan 'das des khyod la ci skad du lung bstan pa de bzhin du zung shig ces smras nas/ lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas de thos
112a7(mdo sde): ma thag tu khyim bdag rmongs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta 'dod par gyur to/ /de nas phyi zhig na yul shur par ka'i tshong pa mang po de dag zong khyer te/ mnyan du yod par dong nas/ de dag gis khyim bdag rmongs pa'i mdun du/
112a8(mdo sde): sangs rgyas dang chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do/ /'di skad ces kyang smras te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa yin gyi/ de blta ba'i phyir khyod song shig dang / des khyod kyi lus dang
112b1(mdo sde): sems kyi nad sos par 'gyur ro/ /de nas des tshig de thos nas lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du bltar 'gro ba'i spro ba skyes so/ /de nas phyi zhig na khyim bdag rmongs pas brgyags mang po khyer te/ bzhon pa bzang po la zhon
112b2(mdo sde): nas yul shur pa ka'i sa nas bar zhag gis mnyan du yod par phyin te/ de ji srid du bzhon du rung ba'i sa de srid du/ bzhon pas song nas/ bzhon pa las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan
112b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ khyim bdag rmongs pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag ni rnag can gyi lus 'di mnam
112b4(mdo sde): par gyur pa/ ngo tsha bar gyur pas na spongs bar 'tshal lo/ /smad par 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag lus 'di ni nad lta bu yin no/ /phol mig lta bu yin no/ /zug rngu lta bu yin no zhes
112b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phung po 'di nyid las brtsams nas/ de la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas khyim bdag rmongs pas stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/ 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mtho ba
112b6(mdo sde): nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/ des bden pa mthong nas bsam pa/ gal te bdag gi lus 'di kho na lta bu ma gyur na/ bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
112b7(mdo sde): la rab tu byung ste/ chu bo rnams las yang dag par rgal bar bya ba dang / sbyor ba rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad par bya ba zhig snyam mo/ /de ltar rab tu byung ba'i sems
112b8(mdo sde): bskyed ma thag tu khyim bdag de'i lus lag mthil bzhin du rma med par gyur to/ /de nas de lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la dga' bar gyur to/ /de nas dga' bar gyur nas stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
113a1(mdo sde): gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba
113a2(mdo sde): ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po 'thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad par 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis
113a3(mdo sde): rab tu phyung te/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang 'bad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ de dgra bcom pa khams gsum
113a4(mdo sde): pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur nas/ gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du 'dra ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan sbangs pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa/ rig pas sgong nga'i sbubs bcom pa/
113a5(mdo sde): rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa'i rnyed pa dang chags pa dang / bkur sti la mi blta ba/ dbang po dang nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod cing rjed pa dang / gus par smra ba'i
113a6(mdo sde): gnas su gyur to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pa snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la song ba las/ ba drus mas brdungs te bsad nas/ de 'chi kar dbang po rnams rnam
113a7(mdo sde): par dang zhing / mdog yongs su dag pa la pags pa'i mdog dkar por gyur to/ /de nas dge slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gyon te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la dong ba las dge
113a8(mdo sde): slong mang po mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la dong ba rnams kyis yul shur pa ka'i khyim bdag rmongs pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de/ ba drus mas brdungs te bsad nas de 'chi kar dbang po rnams rnam par dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog
113b1(mdo sde): yongs su dag te/ pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur to zhes thos so/ /thos nas kyang dge slong mang po rnams mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms blangs te/ zan zos nas zas phyis len pa spangs nas/ lhung bzed dang chos gos bzhag
113b2(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ dge slong mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di
113b3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa 'di na bdag cag dge slong mang po snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos 'tshal te/ lhung bzed thogs nas mnyan du yod par bsod snyoms la mchis pa las/ yul shur par ka'i khyim bdag rmongs
113b4(mdo sde): pa zhes bgyi ba de/ ba drus mas brdungs te bkum nas/ de bkum kar dbang po rnams dang zhing bzhin gyi mdog yongs su dang ste/ pags pa'i mdog dkar bar gyur to zhes thos lags na/ de'i 'gro ba ni gang lags/ de'i skye gnas
113b5(mdo sde): ni gang lags/ 'gro ba'i sa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de ni nga'i chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos rtogs pas na nor du gyur pa yin no/ /dge slong dag rigs kyi bu de
113b6(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das kyis/ 'di'i rus bu'i mchod pa gyis shig /de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pa mchog tu gyur par lung bstan nas/ dge slong mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
113b7(mdo sde): bzhin du mnyan te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas deng nas/ de dag de'i rus bu'i mchod pa byas te/ rus bu'i mchod rten brtsigs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
113b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pas las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas/ ba drus mas brdungs te bkum lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
114a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di nyid kyis las de lta bu byas shing bsags pa'i steng du lhag par yang nga'i smon lam las gyur te/ bu ska ra'i sngon gyi rgyud las byung ba bzhin du rgyas par brjod par bya'o/ /gsol pa/
114a2(mdo sde): btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa rmongs pas las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes lags/ las ci bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas lus rma'i zhu lum du yog par
114a3(mdo sde): gyur te/ 'di'i lus rnag khrag 'dzag cing 'di'i lus las dri nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur la/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes par ma bgyis nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung te/
114a4(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis te/ rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ de'i lus la rma ma mchis par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag
114a5(mdo sde): da ltar 'ba' zhig ma yin te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis las de dag byas shing bsags pas na/ 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa de dag gzhan su zhig gis nyams su myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
114a6(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa rnams ni/ phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur te/ las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing
114a7(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams 'ba' zhig la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro/ /lus can dag gi las rnams ni/ /bskal pa brgyar yang chud mi za/ /tshogs shing dus la bab pa na/ /
114a8(mdo sde): 'bras bu nyid du smin par 'gyur/ /dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ grong khyer bA ra na se na rgyal po tshangs pas byin zhes bya ba zhig rgyal po byed de/ de'i tshe bA ra na se na khyim bdag gnyis zhig gnas pa las de
114b1(mdo sde): gnyis phan tshun 'gras nas/ de'i nang nas gcig gis rgyal po la nor mang po zhig phul te/ khyim bdag gcig shos rgyal po la brnyas nas de rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis shags 'gyed pa'i tshe g.yo shags kyis pham par byas nas
114b2(mdo sde): khyim bdag de la byin te/ des de rang gi khyim du khrid nas lcag gis zhen par zhus nas/ lcag rma de dag gi nang du dug gi phye mas gtor te/ de'i lus sha snag bu bzhin du gyur nas/ de phu nu rnams kyis nor mang po zhig gis blus te/ sman pa'i
114b3(mdo sde): lung gis de'i lus sos par byas so/ /de nas phyi zhig na de skyo ba skyes nas bdag khyim na gnas pas chog gis/ dka' thub kyi nags tshal du 'gro snyams te/ sbyin bdag sbyin zhing bsod nams dag byas nas/ dka'
114b4(mdo sde): thub kyi nags tshal du rten bcas so/ /de der song nas slob dpon med pa dang / man ngag med par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dran par byas nas/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas so/ /de nas des
114b5(mdo sde): bsam pa/ khyim bdag des bdag gis rgyud las bsod nams ma yin pa chen po bskyed kyis/ bdag song la khyim bdag de'i ra mda' bya'o snyam nas/ gnas de nyid nas nam mkha' las khyim bdag de ga la ba der song nas/
114b6(mdo sde): 'bar ba dang / lam mer 'dug pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan to/ /so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul gyis myur du dad par gyur te/ de sdong po sog les bcad pa bzhin du de'i rkang pa la phyag
114b7(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ smras pa/ skal ba chen po pa mar spyon/ bdag nyes par spyod pa'i 'dam du bying ba las lag nas drang du gsol zhes byas so/ /de nas de kho na la snying brtse ba'i phyir sa la babs nas/ des de'i rkang pa la
114b8(mdo sde): phyag 'tshal te/ bzod pa gsol nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod kyang bsod snyoms bzhed la/ bdag kyang bsod nams 'tshal bas/ bdag gi skyed mos tshal 'di nyid du bzhugs shing dang / bdag gis yo byad thams cad
115a1(mdo sde): kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /de nas rang sangs rgyas des khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas gnang ngo / /de nas khyim bdag des rang sangs rgyas de'i phyir yal ga dang lo ma'i spyil po phub nas/ yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen
115a2(mdo sde): bkur byed pa la zhugs so/ /de nas phyi zhig na rang sangs rgyas des bsam pa/ bdag gis rnag can gyi lus 'dis bya ba gang yin pa de ni bdag gis byas zin gyis/ ma la bdag zhi ba'i dbyings su 'jug par bya'o snyam nas/
115a3(mdo sde): 'bar ba dang / lam mer 'dug pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / glog 'gyu ba'i cho 'phrul rnams bstan nas/ phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so/ /de nas khyim bdag des de sku gdung
115a4(mdo sde): la mchod pa byas nas/ sku gdung gi mchod rten brtsigs te/ mchod rten chen po de la bkur sti chen po byas nas/ smon lam btab pa/ kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag gang dang gang du skye bar gyur ba de dang der phyug cing nor mang la
115a5(mdo sde): longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skye bar shog shig / 'di bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed par gyur cig /mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang bdag gis thob par shog
115a6(mdo sde): shig / bdag gis 'di la gnod par byas pa'i las de bdag la 'ong bar ma gyur cig /ci ste las 'di'i rnam par smin pa bdag la gdon mi za bar 'gyur na yang / rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu/ bdag gi bkra
115a7(mdo sde): mi shis pa de med par gyur te/ bkra shis pa 'byung bar gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe khyim bdag du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rmongs pa 'di kho na yin te/ des khyim bdag de'i lus la lcag
115a8(mdo sde): gis bzhus nas/ dug gi phye mas gtor ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der lus 'di lta bur gyur to/ /des phyir yang rang sangs rgyas de la bkur sti byas nas/ smon lam btab pa'i las
115b1(mdo sde): de'i rnam pir smin pas ni gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigs su skyes te/ dge slong dag rang sangs rgyas bye ba 'bum bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags pa nga lta bu 'dis mnyes par byas te/
115b2(mdo sde): mi mnyes par ma byas la/ rab tu byung ba'i sems bskyed ma thag tu de'i bkra mi shis pa med par gyur nas/ bkra shis pa byung bar gyur te/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon
115b3(mdo sde): sum du byas so/ /gzhan yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsungs rab la 'di rab tu byung ste/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa des na da ltar rnam par grol bar gyur
115b4(mdo sde): to/ / //bram ze gsum zhes bya ba de la bram ze dang po ni/ gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gis mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams te/ mchod sbyin byed pa der rgyal khams tha dad pa'i bram ze rnams
115b5(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur te/ de dag gis bsam pa/ mchod sbyin byed pa gang du 'thab mo dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang / 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin de ni mi 'grub bo snyam mo/ /de nas phyi zhig na mchod sbyin byed pa der ljongs na gnas pa'i
115b6(mdo sde): bram ze dang / mthil na gnas pa'i bram ze yon gyi phyir 'dus pa rnams 'thab mo byung nas/ mthil na gnas pa'i bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/ khyed ni zhing blas kyis 'tsho ba tshol ba yin pas na/ yon 'di rnams ni khyod la 'os
115b7(mdo sde): pa ma yin no/ /nged ni yon gnas yin pas na/ yon 'di rnams ni nged la 'os so zhes zer ro/ /ljongs na gnas pa rnams na re/ kye khyod rnams kyang rgyal po'i dpa' bo la bsten pa yin pas na/ khyod ni yon gyi gnas ma yin gyi
115b8(mdo sde): nged ni yon gnas yin pas/ yon gyi 'os yin no zhes zer nas/ de dag der 'thab mo dang / 'tshang 'dru ba dang 'gyed pa dang / rtsod pas g.yem spyo zhing 'khod pa'i skabs su/ bram ze gzhan zhig gis mchod sbyin byed pa'i gnas de nas
116a1(mdo sde): gser dang dngul dang bza' ba dang / bca' ba mang po khyer te bros pa las/ de bram ze de dag gis bzung nas khu tshur dang / rdog pa dag gis shin tu zhen par brdegs te bor ro/ /de nas de brdegs btsogs pas 'chi bas
116a2(mdo sde): 'jigs shing skrag nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du zhugs so/ /de der zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyod lam mdzes shing sgra bskyungs te/ ca co med par 'khod pa mthong ngo / /mthong ma thag tu
116a3(mdo sde): de bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga' bar gyur to/ /de dga' bar gyur nas bsam pa/ bdag bram ze byed pas chog gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
116a4(mdo sde): songs te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
116a5(mdo sde): gsol to/ /btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos po thob tu rung na/ bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshangs par spyad pa spyod par
116a6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dge slong tshur shog ces bya ba'i tshig gis rab tu phyung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas de la lung yang phog ste/ des kyang brtson pa dang / bsgrub pa dang / 'bad pas nyon mongs
116a7(mdo sde): pa thams cad spangs nas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ des dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas bsam pa/ bdag gis gdul bar bya ba 'ga' lta ci yod snyam ste/ des bltas na mchod sbyin gyi bdag po la sogs
116a8(mdo sde): pa/ bram ze stong phrag mang po 'dul bar 'gyur ba mthong nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/ gnas de nyid nas nam mkha' la mchod sbyin gyi gnas der song nas mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang /
116b1(mdo sde): bram ze gzhan de dag gis dge slong de steng gi nam mkha' las 'ong ba mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag dge slong de la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' bar gyur nas de rnams kyis pang gis 'khyud de stan la bzhag
116b2(mdo sde): nas/ rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'khod do/ /de nas dge slong des de dag la de dang mthun pa'i chos bstan te/ de nas mchod sbyin gyi bdag po dang / bram ze de dag gis stan de dag nyid la 'khod bzhin
116b3(mdo sde): du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo mthon po nyi shu ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so/ /'khor de dag gi nang nas phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la
116b4(mdo sde): 'bab pa dang / dge 'dun la bab par byas te bkod do/ /de nas dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bram ze 'dis las ci bgyis na/ las de'i rnam par smin pas 'dis bcom
116b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das mnyes par bgyis te/ mi mnyes par ma bgyis la bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis lags/ bcom ldan
116b6(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyis dbang las gyur to/ /gsol pa/ 'dis smon lam gang du btab lags/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i
116b7(mdo sde): tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang
116b8(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe bA ra na se na bram ze zhig gnas pa las/ gtan tshigs snga ma bzhin du gyur te/ rab tu byung nas des der tshe gcig tu
117a1(mdo sde): tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas 'chi khar smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la/ tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang / yon tan gyi
117a2(mdo sde): tshogs ci yang ma thob kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes
117a3(mdo sde): par byed par ma gyur cig / de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas so/ /dge slong dag ci snyam du sems/ de'i tshe
117a4(mdo sde): bram zer gyur pa gang yin pa de ni/ bram ze 'di kho na yin te/ des der tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa nas/ 'chi kar smon lam btab te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma lung
117a5(mdo sde): bstan pa gang yin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bdag gis mnyes par byed par gyur cig / mi mnyes par byed par ma gyur cig /de kho na'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
117a6(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par gyur cig ces byas pa des na/ dge slong dag nga rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung dang shin tu mnyam pa dang shugs mnyam pa dang / mdzad pa mnyam pa dang / thabs mnyam pa brnyes
117a7(mdo sde): par gyur nas/ 'dis nga mnyes par byas te mi mnyes par ma byas la/ nga nyid kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so// //
117a8(mdo sde): bram ze gnyis pa ni gleng gzhi mnyan du yod pa na bzhugs te/ de'i tshe mnyan du yod pa na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/ thabs zlar babs pa las chung ma blangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' la dga' dgur spyod
117b1(mdo sde): pa las/ phyi zhig na de'i chung ma la bu chags nas de zla ba dgu'am bcu lon pa dang bu btsas te/ rigs dang mthun par ming btags nas/ de 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang mar gyi snying kus bskyed bsrings te/ gang gi tshe
117b2(mdo sde): cher skyes pa de'i tshe/ de yi ge bslabs so/ /bram ze rnams kyi lugs kyis na/ tshes brgyad dang bcwo lnga'i nyin par sang bar byed de/ res 'ga' ni grong khyer ltar 'gro'o/ /res 'ga' ni mu stegs bltar 'gro ba 'am/ yam sreg
117b3(mdo sde): shing thur 'gro'o/ /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze'i khye'u des dus la bab nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ngo / /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i nang na bzhugs shing chos ston te/ bram ze'i
117b4(mdo sde): khye'u des thag ring po zhig nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la shin tu dga' bar gyur to/ /dga' bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
117b5(mdo sde): kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i rkyen dang 'tsham pa'i chos bstan nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la gnas par byas so/ /de nas des
117b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi gtam gyi mjug rdzogs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod cing rjes su yi rangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
117b7(mdo sde): thad nas song ngo / /de nas phyi zhig na bram ze'i khye'u des mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams nas/ bram ze'i khye'u mchod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug pas bsam pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs te/
117b8(mdo sde): longs spyod par mdzad cing / bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso bo la bzhugs na mchod sbyin gyi gnas mdzes par 'gyur to snyam nas des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das mchod sbyin gyi gnas
118a1(mdo sde): 'dir longs spyod cing gshegs par gyur cig ces bslabs so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des sems bskyed ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/
118a2(mdo sde): mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs nas/ mi snang bar bram ze thams cad kyi gral gtso bo la bzhugs so/ /bram ze'i khye'u des ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gral gyi gtso bo la bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bram ze'i khye'u
118a3(mdo sde): des bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/ bza' ba dang bca' ba bzang pos tshim par byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang mchod sbyin gyi gnas de longs spyod nas/ mi snang bar bram ze thams cad la 'od zer gtang
118a4(mdo sde): nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze de dag gis mchod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang de dag na re bdag cag gi mchod sbyin grub po zhes zer ro/ /kha cig na re bdag
118a5(mdo sde): cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa byung ngo zhes zer ro/ /gzhan kha cig na re 'di tshangs pa ma yin gyis/ dbang phyug de bdag cag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas su gshegs so zhes zer ro/ /gzhan kha
118a6(mdo sde): cig na re 'di tshangs pa yang ma yin/ dbang phyug kyang ma yin gyis/ khyab 'jug de bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir byung ngo zhes zer ro/ /bram ze'i khye'u na re khyod rnams thams cad ni bslus pa yin te/ mchod sbyin gyi
118a7(mdo sde): gnas 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das gshegs so zhes zer ro/ /de nas bram ze rnams bram ze'i khye'u la yid ma ches nas/ bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/ bdag gis sang nang par khyed kyi mngon sum du 'gyur bar bya'i
118a8(mdo sde): zhes byas nas/ bram ze'i khye'u des phyir nyin bram ze thams cad 'tshogs pa'i nang du/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzer nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa btsugs nas/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
118b1(mdo sde): tshal logs su phyogs te/ thal mo sbyar nas sems bskyed de tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ni 'di lta ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ci yang mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa
118b2(mdo sde): 'am/ mi rtogs pa 'am/ thugs su mi chud pa ci yang mi mnga' na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / thabs gcig tu bdag gi mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir gshegs te longs spyod par gsol zhes byas
118b3(mdo sde): so/ /de nas de skad ces brjod pa'i mod la/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong mang pos zhabs ring byas te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/ nam mkha' las mchod sbyin gyi gnas der gshegs te/ mi snang bar
118b4(mdo sde): bram ze de rnams kyis gdan bshams pa la bzhugs nas/ bram ze des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mchod sbyin gyi gnas su bzhugs pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
118b5(mdo sde): te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas so/ /de nas bram ze rnams na re khye'u 'di ni smyos te gcig pu ci yang bla zhing 'dug go zhes zer ro/ /de nas
118b6(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'us smras pa/ bdag ni smyos pa ma yin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis zhabs ring byas te/ mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dbus na bzhugs so zhes byas so/ /de nas bram ze'i khye'u des
118b7(mdo sde): de skad brjod ma thag tu/ ci nas bram ze de dag thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par/ mchod sbyin gyi gnas kyi dbus na bzhugs par mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bur bzhugs so/ /
118b8(mdo sde): de nas bram ze'i khye'u des 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas par bza' ba dang / bca' ba gtsang ma bzang po mang pos tshim par byas te/ ci bzhed pa bstabs
119a1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol zin te/ stsang sder ni gyur/ phyag ni bcabs par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
119a2(mdo sde): bram ze'i khye'u de la chos kyi gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug /yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/ /de nas bram ze rnams
